page.title: 05LIFESTYLE
page.content:
MRS LOFTUS
My daughter Rebecca, an early riser, makes sure I'm up on time for kitchen duty.This is a busy part of the day everyone charging around to be on time for their various destinations.With children off to school I dash to the car hoping it will be one of those days when it is possible to get out of Church Street to the main road in less than five minutes!My work involves visiting patients in the Fylde area. Each day seems to be different from the next so I dont have a fixed routine.Living in Kirkham with shopping facilties virtually on the doorstep is proving to be very convenient.Evening activities include children feeding and dog walking.
